bdi4jade.reasoning

Interface BeliefRevisionStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReasoningStrategy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBeliefRevisionStrategy

    public interface BeliefRevisionStrategy
extends ReasoningStrategy
    This interface defines the belief revision strategy to be used within the scope of a capability. This is used during the BDI interpreter cycle to review the beliefs.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reviewBeliefs()
      This method reviews beliefs of a belief base of a capability.

      • Methods inherited from interface bdi4jade.reasoning.ReasoningStrategy

        setCapability

    • Method Detail

      • reviewBeliefs

        void reviewBeliefs()
        This method reviews beliefs of a belief base of a capability. It may check for inconsistencies among beliefs, associate a timestamp with them, and so on.
